thread.title: Motorola celebrates 3rd anniversary today: Offers and discounts on Moto Z, Moto M, Moto Mods and others
thread.title_full: Motorola celebrates 3rd anniversary today: Offers and discounts on Moto Z, Moto M, Moto Mods and others

author: FE Online
title: Motorola celebrates 3rd anniversary today: Offers and discounts on Moto Z, Moto M, Moto Mods and others
text:
Motorola celebrates 3rd anniversary today: Offers and discounts on Moto Z, Moto M, Moto Mods and others Motorola celebrates 3rd anniversary today: Offers and discounts on Moto Z, Moto M, Moto Mods and others Lenovo-owned Motorola is celebrating its third year in India, and to commemorate the occasion, it has unveiled a few offers on its smartphones on Flipkart. The discounts and offers are a part of phones like the Moto M, Moto E2, Moto E3 Power, Moto Z, Moto Z Play, Nexus 6 and more. By: FE Online | Published: February 20, 2017 12:12 PM The ‘Motolove’ sale will run from February 20 to February 21. Users will be able to get discounts worth as much as Rs 20,000 in particular models in exchange to their old devices. Motorola is also offering a 10 percent discount to holders of IndusInd Bank credit cards. 
Lenovo-owned Motorola is celebrating its third year in India, and to commemorate the occasion, it has unveiled a few offers on its smartphones on Flipkart . The discounts and offers are a part of phones like the Moto M, Moto E2, Moto E3 Power, Moto Z, Moto Z Play, Nexus 6 and more. There is a sale on accessories like Moto 360 (2nd Gen) smartwatch, Moto headphones, Moto security camera, Moto Mods. The ‘Motolove’ sale will run from February 20 to February 21. Users will be able to get discounts worth as much as Rs 20,000 in particular models in exchange to their old devices. Motorola is also offering a 10 percent discount to holders of IndusInd Bank credit cards. 
Lenovo offers its customers a flat discount of Rs. 500 on Moto E Power and Rs. 1,000 on the Moto G Turbo Edition smartphones, which will be available at Rs. 7,499 and Rs. 8,999 respectively. Moto M (64GB) in grey, gold and silver colour variants are available at Rs 17,999. Moto M (32GB) in grey colour can be bought at Rs 15,999. Customers will be able to get as much as Rs 15,000 off on exchange. There is also an offer of extra 5 percent for users of Axis bank Buzz credit cards. You can also buy the Moto E (2nd Gen) smartphone for Rs. 5,999 (earlier price of Rs. 6,999 for the 8GB model) or Moto E (2nd Gen) 3G smartphone, which is priced at Rs. 4,999 (earlier price of Rs. 5,999). 
As a part of the ‘Motolove’ sale, users will be able to get Moto Nexus 6 for a price of Rs 19,999, for the 32 GB model and Rs 25,999 for the 64GB model. Usually, these phones are available for Rs 21,999 and Rs 29,999 respectively. Moto Nexus 6 (32GB) will be available at Rs. 19,999 (usual price of Rs. 21,999) while the 64GB storage variant of the smartphone will be available at Rs. 25,999 (currently available at Rs. 29,999. 
In terms of accessories, the Motorola Pulse Max wired headset has been priced for as low as Rs 799. Motorola Pulse 2 wired headset has been priced at Rs 649. The Motorola Lumineers wired headset can be bought at Rs 449. Moto Mods is available with no cost EMI. The JBL SoundBoost Speaker Mod is now priced at Rs 6,999. The Moto Insta Share Projector Mobile and Hasselblad True Zoom Camera mods are available for Rs 19,999 each. Meanwhile, Motorola Moto 360 2nd Gen smartwatch is now available at Rs 16,999. The Moto 360 Sport smartwatch and Moto 360 Sport smartwatch can be bought at Rs 15,499. Please Wait while comments are loading...
